channel.title: [562] ChaoticScape [562]
channel.description:
Hello all, I was looking for a Development team.
Information
-You must be able to do one of the following-
1.) Java Coding 2.) Web client Coding 3.) Forum Coding 4.) GFX Emoting 6.) Recruiting Skills 7.) Modelling 8.) Configuring (editting .config files)
If you have any of those skills, Please respond to this post.
[color=green]-Development Team- Owners - Dillon Takes care of all the wonderful players
Coder(1) - None Takes care of coding all the wonderful stuff for the players
Gfx Creator(2)- None Takes care of all Signatures and Images for the players
Forum Manager(2) - None Takes care of all problems on the forums
Modeler(1)- None Takes care of making custom items.
To get on the team please privide the following information:
My name: Application I am wanting: How long you have been doing this: Any proof you may have: MSN:
Thanks alot

My name: Horel
Application I am wanting: Forum Manager
How long you have been doing this: 1 Year
